snippet: A group that had worked to advance the prospects of youths without legal papers and helped mobilize Latinos who voted for President Obama now says it’s payback time.
abstract: Large group of young illegal immigrants who helped mobilize overwhelming Latino support for Pres Obama's reelection are now looking for payback, seeking legislation to give them direct and permanent path to citizenship; Pres Obama has said bill to legalize 11 million illegal immigrants in the United States will be at the top of his 2013 agenda.
lead_paragraph: A group that had worked to advance the prospects of youths without legal papers and helped mobilize Latinos who voted for President Obama now says it’s payback time.

headline.seo: Dream Act Gives Young Immigrants a Political Voice
headline.main: Young Immigrants Say It’s Obama’s Time to Act
headline.print_headline: Young Immigrants Say It’s Obama’s Time to Act

keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
keywords.name: subject
